summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Risk Management Module new tabs and features. All new features (Velocity, Blacklist, Investigation tabs) are working correctly with full backend-frontend integration.
passed_tests: Risk Dashboard API - Complete structure with daily_alerts, open_cases, high_risk_players
Velocity Rules API (NEW TAB) - Seeded data with complete structure (Fast Withdrawals, Test Rapid Deposits)
Blacklist API (NEW TAB) - Seeded data with complete structure (IP entries with reasons)
Evidence API (INVESTIGATION TAB) - Create and retrieve functionality working
Frontend: All 11 tabs visible and functional (Overview, Live Alerts, Cases, Investigation, Rules, Velocity, Payment, IP & Geo, Bonus Abuse, Blacklist, Logic)
Frontend: Velocity tab loads correctly with velocity checks table
Frontend: Blacklist tab loads correctly with Add to Blacklist button
Frontend: Add to Blacklist dialog opens and closes properly
Frontend: Investigation tab loads correctly with Evidence & Notes table
Frontend: Add Evidence dialog opens with correct title and form fields
Frontend: Add Evidence form validation - Related ID, Type dropdown (Internal Note/File Document), Description textarea
Frontend: Add Evidence save functionality - Dialog closes, data persists, appears in table
Frontend: Evidence table displays correctly with Type, Description, Related To, Time columns
Frontend: Tab navigation between all tabs working correctly
Backend-Frontend Integration: Evidence creation from frontend successfully saves to backend and displays in table
Backend-Frontend Integration: Velocity rules display correctly from seeded data
Backend-Frontend Integration: Blacklist entries display correctly from seeded data

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All Risk module APIs working correctly
success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All new tabs and features working correctly
